author: Ian Forshaw
comment: Update 25 Feb 2018: Although still an excellent app, I've had to return to OneNote for Folders and Menus. Keep is good up to a point then it just takes too long to jump to a note quickly. 1st  review: This is a cracking good Note app and I use it on all my devices. I would ask for only two things to be added - Folders to contain my different  subjects and a start page with an alphabetical index of folders so that I can jump directly to my required folder and thence to my note.

author: Maksud Arefin
comment: I have been using OneNote, developed by Microsoft, for last two and half years in my local branded phone. I'm also trying Google Keep last one month.  Actually, I'm falling in love with Google keep. It's easy to use. It has plenty of customized and productive features.  I don't know why I'm facing some lag like scrolling, late response etc. But, To be honest, I haven't face that kind of lagging in OneNote.  Please, fix it. At last, I wish it could have unlimited entry capability like OneNote.  Thank you.

author: Javier Casares
comment: Sometimes you're too accustomed to a way of working that you see simplicity as a burden. I really like to have a desktop interface for entering data massively and quick, while having an up to date counterpart. I also like to have a simple design. The search behaviour is also well done. I do hope the app keeps improving while retaining simplicity.

author: Chitrank Sharma
comment: There's a huge problem with handling images. 1. Images cannot be seen on full screen, a white bar covers them for no good reason.2. High resolution images look completely distorted at first on all phones. However they become clear when the pen icon is pressed to edit them and when they are saved again, their resolution drops but clarity is maintained.

author: Eric Travers
comment: If Keep had encrypted notes it would be the best thing going. Apple has it. Why don't you? I got tired of having to use gpg for random notes. Way too many extra steps. Now I use 'Standard Notes'. Problem solved. Doesn't have as many bells and whistles, but I have privacy.

author: Rene Kadoo
comment: Double notifications becoming exceedingly annoying. It would a much better experience of we could swipe between reminders once we are viewing them individually, instead of going back to main screen - like I'm Gmail Thanks for more colors!

author: Jason Chang
comment: Problematic app!! It says can work offline, but when go online, all notes disappear. So disappointed with you Google keep. Even working online, my notes disappear too. Do you have other better app?

author: Mark Souvalian
comment: Should have easier way to attach a file from Google Keep to Google Calendar with out routing through Google Docs.  Also sharing to popular or proprietary file storage.  Can't handle too many pics per note or app crashes when you try and open note.

author: Anthony Daniels
comment: When a reminder goes off  it alters the position of the note in the list from where I carefully had it... it gets moved  to the top so I have to move it back to where I want it.  I STILL get duplicate notifications - usually if one has fired and I go into the app subsequently it then fires again and there are 2.  Also, can the default reminder time be 8am tomorrow consistently. Sometimes it is, other times it isn't dependent on what the time is when you set it. Poor handling of 2 devices - deferring a notification on 1 doesn't on the other - and when you do dismiss it on the 2nd it cancels the deferred time set on the 1st. Of all google apps, this is the buggies and is getting worse

author: Chandra Sekhar Y
comment: Have been using GoogleKeep from years. Great to see the improvements and it has really been a part of my routine to keep track of my activities or for bucket listing or things to be done or saving notes or writing Mind thoughts and the List continues 😂.. This App has been a part of my Mobile 😀.Undo Option addition features is much appreciated though. Thanks Google and waiting for more improvements and exciting updates.

author: 焦抹Caramel
comment: I love this app. However, it's often stuck. The situation isn't as bad as before (previous version), but it continues. When I open this app, it would get stuck and pop up a hint which says this application has stopped.

author: Nifer B
comment: I was very happy using Keep. Lots of notes, check-lists and recipes all saved and colour-coded for me to use whenever I needed them.... Then I got a new phone! Keep was one of the first apps I downloaded to this wonderful new device. I synced it to my email so I could access all my notes etc, but NOTHING! No notes, check-lists or recipes!  I tried syncing the old and new device several times. I tried Bluetooth transfer, I tried archiving and unarchiving. Nothing, nada, niet, ZIP! Did I miss something google?

author: Sasha.M
comment: This app is so outdated, no useful functions, always buggy, problems with synchronization. No option to add many folders, to lock app, duplicate notes.. It's time for renewing or finding another app..

author: Tony Harrison
comment: I really like this app. It syncs very well to my computer and if I create a custom reminder list, it will alert me whenever I go shopping and if I am in the store that I setup the reminder for it will alert me. I use this app all the time. It's also great for saving web page link into. I do wish they would allow me to create a password for certain notes.

author: Anna Jones
comment: Don't know what happened with this app. It always freezes once I'm typing something. Then I can't even close it out because the keyboard is stuck on my screen.

author: Mohit Chaubey
comment: After the update on 26th Feb, Keep widget takes a really long time to load after screen unlock . Please fix. Older version didn't have problem.

author: Ivan Pasic
comment: Please introduce an option to sort notes alphabetically! This is an extremely useful feature. Frankly, I can't fathom how anyone would design this type of app without that feature.

author: Richard Chancellor
comment: I have a suggestion. I give you five stars if you add the possibility to lock the app with a master password. It could be useful especially if your notes are very personal!

author: Tejas Tez
comment: Not reliable. Lost my most important notes recently because of poor sync functionality. And this is not even the first time. Moving on to some other app.

author: chpn exec
comment: KEEP keeps on crashing on Infinix hot 5 lite phone 7.1 and the pictures keep going off. Pls make keep simple and easy to use biko!!

author: Wojciech Starczewski
comment: Very useful and easy to use but lacks some options like deleting notes by dragging them somewhere (you have to long press it and then delete what kinda sucks) speak design.

author: Rayven CF Chan
comment: Preferably can embed table (as image is also okay). Preferably reminders can link to Google Calendar.  Everything else is great. The best notes app so far.

author: Stephen King
comment: Just perfect. Then they add something else. More of a home problem but shopping lists should add into keep from home.

author: Thomas Ahn
comment: I would love it if I could order notes by whether they are images, text, text with images, links, and lists. Otherwise good.

author: Swastik mantry
comment: It is a great app for me....my only concern is that if u could add a little security...I mean like a pin to access the whole app or a few contents...as even other apps do..but my user experience with keep has till date been the best

author: Mickey Zanardo
comment: Please... Add a  small widget shortcut to a specific note...I have to open and locate a particular note that I use often every time I'd like to jot something down... Easily done I'm sure.. Other than that, I do find this app very useful and simple... Good bye Evernote and your subscriptions.

author: Sarvesh Akhouri
comment: Please either add 'date of creation' or provide an option to insert date and time as it is very important for some of the notes to know when the note was actually created. An option for location stamp will also be appreciated. Sort by alphabetical order, creation date, edited date, place of creation, etc. Should also be added for ease. Thank for a all in one app.
Good and simplistic app. Only two suggestion to make... Add option for multiple reminders to same task.. Add option for list view with only titles..

author: Ivan Lopez
comment: Love it! I use it for all of my notes and it's really useful when switching to a new device.

author: Pandurang Waghulde
comment: Nice app. But unable to add reminders now. Its just let you create note.

author: Rudy Rude
comment: 5 stars because you have improved.. however, a neat feature would be to assign/add collaborators to labels.. instead of adding collaborators one by one to a note.. why set colours?! Just add a hex colour scale so we can customize our own colours

author: SURYANARAAYAN B
comment: Could you bring back the feature to snooze a note reminder by an hour after it has fired, right from the notification shade? In other ways I very much like the app.

author: Ryu Zi
comment: Are you spying on us? Why this simple apps always has update and always has bugs to fix?
The app is almost okay. But there's something I noticed regarding on updating the app. It always says to update even though I already did. Please fix this

author: Germán Esteban Dziekonski Dupré
comment: It is a mess wen you need to find something. There is no alphabetical order for big lists, this app needs one

author: Mouly Dubey
comment: I think this app need some upgradation like switching between read only and editing because this is only on editing mode sometimes we enter some number and by mistake enter another number in between and forget than it is very difficult to know recover old one  So i want you to add a switching button between read only and edit so that whenever required we can edit and than switch to read only so that by mistake also the real things should not bw edited

author: Aleksi Siltala
comment: Widgetti ja sovellus sekoilevat lähes jatkuvasti muistiinpanojen kanssa (ei sykronoidu + nykyään widgetti ei edes näytä kaikkia muistiinpanoja).  Välillä widgetistä myös katoavat kaikki muistiinpanot, jonka voi korjata tekemällä uuden widgetin.  Joskus widgetti ei myöskään tallenna muistiinpanoja, jolloin ne katoavat kokonaan, tai jäljelle jää vain valkoinen muistiinpanon alku.

author: Mohammed Ali
comment: I do like the app although the pictures that appear do not appear as they are which is why I think Google should add a feature where if the pic was chosen, there should be an option to open that image in the gallery app in its full quality to save time scrolling through photos

author: Hero Pumarejo
comment: Excellent UI! I use it every day to track notes and complete checklists. Love that it links to your Google account for easy access simply by signing in! Would be nice to have security code protection for certain notes.

author: Jacques Theron
comment: Good, simple app for keeping notes and checklists.  Question: Is it possible to bring integration with Google Assistant? When I try to take notes, it says "no notes apps installed" despite Google Keep being present.
